citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:30 am &
1:00 pm on 10-JAN-17.
For both time periods, the inspector honked vehicle horn at gate, called both home and cell phone numbers and
waited at least 30 minutes outside the gate.
Accompanied by MDA

narrative:
2.126(b)                    REPEAT
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:30 am &
1:00 pm on 10-JAN-17.
For both time periods, the inspector honked vehicle horn at gate, called both home and cell phone numbers and
waited at least 30 minutes outside the gate.   
Accompanied by MDA
